title: Red Wine Syrup
directions: In a small saucepan, combine wine, rosemary, cloves, fennel seed and sugar. Cook over medium heat to dissolve sugar, the simmer for 15 minutes tio infuse flavours.
Increase heat to medium-high and reduce liquid to 3/4 cups.
Carefully strain liquid and let cool. Refrigerate until ready to use and serve warm or at room temp. Keeps in fridge for 2 weeks.
